tooltips.reply:
Notify email senders that their emails has been received.

 Only one email will be sent to a particular recipient during some period of time to prevent looping.
tooltips.createCase: Automatically create case from incoming emails.
tooltips.replyToAddress: Specify email address of this mailbox to make responses come here.
tooltips.caseDistribution: How cases will be assigned to. Assigned directly to the user or among the team.
tooltips.assignToUser: User cases will be assigned to.
tooltips.team: Team cases will be assigned to.
tooltips.teams: Teams emails will be assigned to.
tooltips.targetUserPosition: Users with specified position will be distributed with cases.
tooltips.addAllTeamUsers: Emails will be appearing in Inbox of all users of specified teams.
tooltips.monitoredFolders: Multiple folders should be separated by comma.
tooltips.smtpIsShared: If checked then users will be able to send emails using this SMTP. Availability is controlled by Roles through the Group Email Account permission.
tooltips.smtpIsForMassEmail: If checked then SMTP will be available for Mass Email.
tooltips.storeSentEmails: Sent emails will be stored on the IMAP server.

messages.couldNotConnectToImap: Could not connect to IMAP server
